sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>72</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/72</github_url> <message>```javascript var inc = new GlideRecord('incident'); inc.setLimit(1); inc.query(); inc.next(); gs.info(inc instanceof GlideRecord); // outputs true ```</message> <number>TIL0001073</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-07-10 19:20:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>f4c2d36b1b7d50108ed631d7dc4bcb79</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-07-17 14:37:35</sys_updated_on> <title>Find if an object is Gliderecord</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
